resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103539</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103539</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206277</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Superfund for Students and Teachers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Superfund für Kursteilnehmer und Lehrer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Superfund pour des étudiants et des professeurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Superfund para estudantes e professores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Superfund per gli allievi e gli insegnanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Superfund για τους σπουδαστές και τους δασκάλους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Superfund para los estudiantes y los profesores</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">contains information about Superfund and hazardous waste for junior high, high school, and college students, and teachers of all grade levels. The site includes classroom activities, frequently asked questions, and information on environmentaleducation and grants.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">enthält Informationen über Superfund und 
gefährliche Vergeudung für hohe, Juniorhigh School und Studenten, 
und Lehrer alles Grades ebnet. Die Site schließt die 
Klassenzimmeraktivitäten ein, Fragen und um um Informationen über 
environmentaleducation und Bewilligungen häufig gebeten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">contient les informations sur Superfund et la 
perte dangereuse pour le hauts, lycée, et étudiants d'université 
juniors, et les professeurs de toute la catégorie nivelle. Le 
site inclut des activités de salle de classe, fréquemment demandées
des questions, et l'information sur l'environmentaleducation et les 
concessions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">contem a informação sobre Superfund e o 
desperdício perigoso para a High School, e estudantes de faculdade 
elevados, júniors, e os professores de toda a classe nivelam. O
local inclui as atividades da sala de aula, pedidas freqüentemente 
perguntas, e informação no environmentaleducation e nas concessões.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">contiene le informazioni su Superfund ed il 
rifiuto pericoloso per l'alti, High School ed allievi di università 
minori e gli insegnanti di tutto il grado livella. Il luogo 
include le attività dell'aula, chieste frequentemente le domande e le
informazioni sul environmentaleducation e sulle concessioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιέχει τις πληροφορίες για Superfund και τα 
επιβλαβή απόβλητα για το νεώτερο υψηλό, το γυμνάσιο, και τους 
σπουδαστές κολλεγίων, και τους δασκάλους όλων των επιπέδων 
βαθμού. Η περιοχή περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες τάξεων, 
υπέβαλε συχνά τις ερωτήσεις, και τις πληροφορίες για το 
environmentaleducation και τις επιχορηγήσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">contiene la información sobre Superfund y los 
desechos peligrosos para la High School, y los estudiantes de 
universidad altos, secundarios menores, y los profesores de todo el 
grado nivelan. El sitio incluye las actividades de la sala de 
clase, pedidas con frecuencia preguntas, y la información sobre el 
environmentaleducation y concesiones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206277</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103539</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/superfund-for-students-and-teachers</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
